sources.title: Blood Alley (1955) John Wayne · Lauren Bacall
sources.description: When his ship is confiscated by Chinese communists, American merchant captain Tom Wilder spends a long time in prison. But thanks to the help of Chinese villagers, he escapes and sails with them to Hong Kong in return. ..

sources.title: Blood Alley | Full Movie | Steven Seagal Action | True Justice Series
sources.description:
True Justice: *Blood Alley* - Still in Vancouver, the CIA asks Kane and his team to take down a high-level gang boss involved in human smuggling, but Kane’s investigation uncovers a larger conspiracy involving organ-trafficking, and the CIA promises Kane that killing the man at the top will bring Kane one step closer to The Ghost.
2010.  Stars: Steven Seagal, Sarah Lind, William 'Big Sleeps' Stewart, Meghan Ory, Warren Christie

metadata.Plot: A merchant marine captain, rescued from the Chinese Communists by local villagers, is "shanghaied" into transporting the whole village to Hong Kong on an ancient paddle steamer.
metadata.Actors: John Wayne, Lauren Bacall, Paul Fix
